venue.address_1: Columbus Ave. @ Stuart St. (Corners of Stuart & Arlington Sts.)
venue.name: The Castle at Boston Park Plaza

item.description:
Girls Night Out is a Fun Night Out

 Pay $10.63 ($30 value) for admission and to be eligible for a swag bag of gifts by entering discount code WELCOMEBACK.

You must use this link to get the deal,

http://store.sheckys.com/shop/index.php/tickets/events/girls-night-out-boston-fall-2012-group.html

Get there early for your best chance to get a bag of goodies.

This is what you can expect if you choose to join in the FUN:

Sip delicious complimentary cocktails while you shop the latest fashions.

Shop at Shecky's new Luxury Designer Pavilion, featuring established fashion designers and styles discounted up to 75% off retail.

  Get your best bod ever with mini VelaShape sessions from American Laser Skincare.

Pick up brand new, never-before-seen original styles from over 40 young, emerging designers.

Get primped and pampered with makeovers, manicures and other beauty services.

 

 

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit.

Green line to Arlington Station

Orange line to Back Bay Station

Orange line to Tufts Medical Center Station
item.name: Shopping Under the Influence (SUI)
